price: E os que Lhe chegam, sendo crentes, havendo feito, de fato, as boas obras, então, esses terão os altos escalões,
arabic: وَمَن يَأۡتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنٗا قَدۡ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتُ ٱلۡعُلَىٰ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waman yatihi mu'minan qad ʿamila al-ṣāliḥāti fa-ulāika lahumu al-darajātu al-ʿulā
